document.full_text: as david beckham enters the final year of his contract with the los angeles galaxy, the fans who once serenaded him with songs have changed their tune and are now openly hostile to him.
document.title: in los angeles, a broken relationship
lines_and_colors: as david beckham enters the final year of his contract with the los angeles galaxy, the fans who once serenaded him with songs have changed their tune and are now openly hostile to him.
